scripts.compile: bun build index.ts --compile --outfile receita --external mysql --external oracledb --external sqlite3 --external tedious --external pg-query-stream --external pg --external better-sqlite3
scripts.compile:cron: bun build cron.ts --compile --outfile cron-job --external mysql --external oracledb --external sqlite3 --external tedious --external pg-query-stream --external pg --external better-sqlite3
scripts.compile:validar: bun build src/validar.ts --outfile dist/validar.js --target node --external mysql --external oracledb --external sqlite3 --external tedious --external pg-query-stream --external pg --external better-sqlite3
scripts.build:fill: bun build fillanterior.ts --outfile dist/fill.js --target node --external mysql --external oracledb --external sqlite3 --external tedious --external pg-query-stream --external pg --external better-sqlite3
